name: AFGBuildablePoweredWall
comment: A wall with a power socket, provides the whole building with power.

methods.name: AddConnection
methods.comment: Adds a connection from a building to the walls internal (hidden) connection.

methods.name: GetFoundationConnection
methods.comment: @return The hidden connection all buildings are supposed to connect to; otherwise nullptr, e.g. if not set up correcly.
